languages.text: "Возможно, пришлому ставленнику Леди Теодоры и нет дела до священных традиций наших предков-основателей..." {n}Губернатор многозначительно кивает в сторону Абеляра.{/n} "Однако {name} фон Валанциус — потомок истинных детей Даргонуса! Владыке мира пристало чтить обычаи".

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, пришлому ставленнику леди Теодоры и нет дела до священных традиций наших предков-основателей..." {n}Губернатор многозначительно кивает в сторону Абеляра.{/n} "Однако {name} фон Валанциус — потомок истинных детей Даргонуса! Владыке мира пристало чтить обычаи".

languages.text: "Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, пришлому ставленнику Леди Теодоры и нет дела до священных традиций наших предков-основателей..." {n}Губернатор многозначительно кивает в сторону Абеляра.{/n} "Однако {name} фон Валанциус — потомок истинных детей Даргонуса! Владыке мира пристало чтить обычаи".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps a parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}Urbend gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behooves the master of a world to honor its customs."

It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

"Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

languages.text: “或许西奥多拉夫人安排的暴发户并不在乎我们立朝祖先的神圣传统……”{n}总督朝阿贝拉德的方向意味深长地点了点头。{/n}“但{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是真正的达戈努斯人的后裔！身为这个世界的统治者，理当尊重这个世界的习俗。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

traits.locale_text: “或许西奥多拉夫人安排的暴发户并不在乎我们立朝祖先的神圣传统……”{n}总督朝阿贝拉德的方向意味深长地点了点头。{/n}“但{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯是真正的达戈努斯人的后裔！身为这个世界的统治者，理当尊重这个世界的习俗。”

languages.text: «Tal vez al arribista instalado por lady Theodora no le importen las tradiciones sagradas de los fundadores...». {n}El gobernador asiente en dirección a Abelard.{/n} «¡Pero {name} von Valancius es descendiente de los verdaderos hijos de Dargonus! Alguien que gobierna un mundo debería regirse por sus costumbres».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez al arribista instalado por lady Theodora no le importen las tradiciones sagradas de los fundadores...». {n}El gobernador asiente en dirección a Abelard.{/n} «¡Pero {name} von Valancius es descendiente de los verdaderos hijos de Dargonus! Alguien que gobierna un mundo debería regirse por sus costumbres».

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様が遺した成り上がりものは、我が建国の父祖の神聖なる伝統を重んじないのかもしれませんが…」{n}総督がアベラルドの方へ向けて、意味深にうなずく。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはダルゴナスの真の子供たちの末裔！惑星の支配者は国の習慣を尊重する必要があります」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様が遺した成り上がりものは、我が建国の父祖の神聖なる伝統を重んじないのかもしれませんが…」{n}総督がアベラルドの方へ向けて、意味深にうなずく。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはダルゴナスの真の子供たちの末裔！惑星の支配者は国の習慣を尊重する必要があります」

languages.text: "Vielleicht ist dem von Lady Theodora eingesetzten Emporkömmling nicht an den heiligen Traditionen unserer Gründerväter gelegen ..." {n}Der Gouverneur nickt bedeutsam in Abelards Richtung.{/n} "Aber {name} von Valancius stammt von den wahren Kindern von Dargonus ab! Es geziemt {mf|dem Herrscher|der Herrscherin} einer Welt, ihre Gebräuche zu achten."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ist dem von Lady Theodora eingesetzten Emporkömmling nicht an den heiligen Traditionen unserer Gründerväter gelegen ..." {n}Der Gouverneur nickt bedeutsam in Abelards Richtung.{/n} "Aber {name} von Valancius stammt von den wahren Kindern von Dargonus ab! Es geziemt {mf|dem Herrscher|der Herrscherin} einer Welt, ihre Gebräuche zu achten."

languages.text: « Le parvenu promu par dame Théodora se fiche peut-être des traditions instaurées par nos ancêtres, {n}rétorque le gouverneur en jetant un regard éloquent à Abélard.{/n} Mais {name} von Valancius est {mf|le descendant|la descendante} des vrais enfants de Dargonus ! Il est du devoir sacré d'{mf|un souverain|une souveraine} d'honorer les coutumes de son monde. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

traits.locale_text: « Le parvenu promu par dame Théodora se fiche peut-être des traditions instaurées par nos ancêtres, {n}rétorque le gouverneur en jetant un regard éloquent à Abélard.{/n} Mais {name} von Valancius est {mf|le descendant|la descendante} des vrais enfants de Dargonus ! Il est du devoir sacré d'{mf|un souverain|une souveraine} d'honorer les coutumes de son monde. »

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora'nın atadığı sonradan görmeler, düzenimizi kuran atalarımızın kutsal geleneklerini önemsemiyor olabilir." {n}Vali, Abelard'a doğru anlamlı bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius ise Dargonus'un evlatlarının soyundan gelmektedir! Bir dünyanın hükümdarının, o dünyanın geleneklerini onurlandırması icap eder."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the parvenu installed by Lady Theodora cares not for the sacred traditions of our founding ancestors..." {n}The governor gives a meaningful nod in Abelard's direction.{/n} "But {name} von Valancius is a descendant of the true children of Dargonus! It behoves the ruler of a world to honour its customs."

traits.locale_text: "Belki Leydi Theodora'nın atadığı sonradan görmeler düzenimizin kurucusu atalarımızın kutsal geleneklerini önemsemiyor olabilirler." {n}Vali, Abelard'a doğru anlamlı bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius ise Dargonus'un evlatlarının gerçek bir üyesidir! Bir dünyanın hükümdarının, o dünyanın geleneklerini onurlandırması icap eder."
